attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The country's in the doldrums, and the Conservatives are marching back to 10 Downing Street. The only way to save us from another disasterous Tory government is for Gordon Brown to step aside, and allow a clean break. David Miliband, step forward. Gordon Brown was unelected as Prime Minister,  and we have witnessed one disaster after another. What next?

So, we the undersigned, call for Gordon Brown to step down as PM, allow a new leader to step forward, and call a new general election IMMEDIATELY.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Saveenglandnow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
